Key to the genera of Boraginaceae

source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Boraginaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Boraginaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Cauline leaves with strongly decurrent bases; stems broadly winged; calyces not elongating with age; flowers usually yellowish-white, sometimes purplish or pink
Cauline leaves with slightly decurrent bases; stems narrowly winged; calyces some- times elongating with age; flowers blue or purplish-blue
